title: Video Premiere: Blaenavon – Denim Patches
content:
These über talented kids clearly have a remarkable future ahead of them.

From playing their first London show earlier in the week, to being featured on NME’s Radar, Blaenavon are grasping 2012 by the throat. Having Introduced the group last year and been completely astounded by their confidence, maturity and songwriting skills, we jumped at the chance to premiere their first ever official music video for the stunning Denim Patches. Composed half of their own footage and half of collected clips, there’s a strong narrative throughout, with the contemplative, idyllic scenes mirroring the delicate atmosphere of the track, it’s a perfect visual debut. Immerse yourself in the video for Blaenavon’s Denim Patches by Johnny Griffiths below.

Download via Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
